works.complaint:
Good Morning,

My name is Boyd Craig from Formula 1 Car Centre LTD.  I am writing to you  
regarding a review of our company that has appeared on Google. I find the  
comments to contain a complete inaccuracy of the actual events and I find  
it completely damaging and defamatory to the welfare of Formula 1 Car  
Centre LTD. I find it completely unfair that I have no right of reply to  
these lie's and I would ask that you remove the comments and furthermore  
disable the ability for comments to be left about Formula 1 Car Centre on  
Google.

If you require anymore information please do not hesitate to contact me on  
01324 639999 or by email boydcraigformula1@hotmail.co.uk

I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind Regards

Boyd Craig
Formula 1 Car Centre LTD
